name: Ch.5XBaseConvo1
_source: speak;Ephraim;Well, Kyle, we're running thin on supplies. We're going to have to make this next battle count.
speak;Kyle;Agreed, my Prince.|I hope we can manage.
speak;Anna;I'm Anna, a traveling merchant!|I'm here to make a deal with you.
speak;Kyle;A merchant, huh?|Prince Ephraim, this may be a good chance to resupply!
speak;Ephraim;You're right, Kyle. What a lucky break!.|What wares do you have available?|We are in need of food, and weapons.
speak;Anna;He he he, perfect!|I'm glad my sister's information was correct!|Now I can finally start making a profit!
speak;Ephraim;Kyle, I will let you handle managing the food.
speak;Anna;I also have some potential allies for you, if you're interested!
speak;Anna;Oh yes!|Alright, you two!|Come on out!
speak;HorseyBoy;Indeed, though we don't think we were always this way.
speak;HorseyBoy;Indeed I did, though my sister here cannot speak.|So... Please don't consider her rude.
speak;HorseyBoy;I don't believe we're related by blood.|You see, we were experimented on by some dark-robed men.|Fortunately, a different dark-robed man set us free.
speak;HorseyBoy;For what, I don't know.|My mind is all scrambled.|So there isn't much I can tell you...
speak;HorseyBoy;What I do know is that we have a friend in Renvall that we want to rescue.|Anna told us you were going there.|We want to join you.
speak;Ephraim;A friend...|I see...|I guess if you're willing to help us, it's fine.|But...
speak;Ephraim;Alright, you two are in.|Keep a low profile, though.|It's harder to lead a larger group for this operation.
speak;HorseyBoy;Well...|We don't really remember our names...|And the robed men just gave us numbers.|If you need names, feel free to call us whatever you like.
speak;Ephraim;In that case, your names will be...
speak;Ephraim;Our operation needs a low body count.|I'm sorry, but we can't risk it.
speak;HorseyBoy;I see...|While it saddens me to hear that, I understand.|We will see if we can find our friend another way...
